DOC.brief_summary: One of the proposed mechanisms in CU is autoimmunity. It was shown by a positive response to autologous serum skin test (ASST)in almost half of chronic urticaria (CU) patients. IL-18 also play a role in autoimmune disorders. The investigators aim was to investigate the relationship of ASST and IL-18 in CU and respiratory allergic diseases.
DOC.brief_title: Autologous Serum Skin Test and Serum IL-18 Levels in Chronic Idiopathic Urticaria and Respiratory Allergic Diseases
